# Python 2018 年度报告完整版（麻瓜编程译）

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/python-2018-niandubaogao-wanzhengban-magua-biancheng-yi
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/python-2018-niandubaogao-wanzhengban-magua-biancheng-yi
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install python-2018-niandubaogao-wanzhengban-magua-biancheng-yi
python-2018-niandubaogao-wanzhengban-magua-biancheng-yi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g python-erlingyiba-niandubaogao-wanzhengban-magua-biancheng-yi
python-erlingyiba-niandubaogao-wanzhengban-magua-biancheng-yi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
